title: Photos: Dirk makes preseason debut; Mavs lose 91-84 to Hawks
text: Oct 16, 2015; Dallas, TX, USA; Dallas Mavericks center Zaza Pachulia (27) and guard John Jenkins (12) and forward Dirk Nowitzki (41) defend against Atlanta Hawks forward Tiago Splitter (11) during the first quarter at the American Airlines Center.
